A

addBonus(int) - Method in class com.jensen.yatzy.model.Player
This methods checks if index 6 has a value of 42 or more, if so the bonus will be given (50 points), else no bonus will be given.
addDiceListener(ActionListener) - Method in class com.jensen.yatzy.view.GameView
Adds an ActionListener to all the dice buttons
AddMenuListener(ActionListener) - Method in class com.jensen.yatzy.view.NewGamePanel
Adds an ActionListener to the okButton, the numberOfPlayers and yatzyModeOptions
addPlayers(String[]) - Method in class com.jensen.yatzy.model.Yatzy
Creates a list that stores names in it
addPlayListener(ActionListener) - Method in class com.jensen.yatzy.view.GameView
Adds an ActionListener to the roll button and the done button
addScore(int, int) - Method in class com.jensen.yatzy.model.Player
Adds a score to a specific index.
addSum() - Method in class com.jensen.yatzy.model.Player
Adds all the combinations from the upper scoreboard (1-6) and stores the value in index 6 (total).
addTotal() - Method in class com.jensen.yatzy.model.Player
This method adds all the index and stores the value in the last index(Total)
